skillTree.localised_description: No matter what form the Changeling is in, his next appearance is only a thought away.
Deformation and reformation are at the very heart of the Changeling, whether it be of space, matter, or even time.
Unsurprisinginly, the Changeling has always felt a kinship with others who have undergone massive reconstruction of their bodily forms.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -25% for Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Who pays the piper? Why, Fateweaver's opponents, of course, with their minds and souls as coins of currency.
Having effected Change upon one's enemies, what next for the Mocking Watcher? More of the same, naturally, for to do so over and over again brings the sweetest of raptures.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways cooldown: -1 turns
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -2 turns
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -3 turns

skillTree.localised_description: The Ways of Magic float and shimmer around the Changeling, wrapped within his mutable form, strengthening him with every change.
With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Changeling can take the form of other beings, from the tiniest of insects to the most massive of Greater Daemons, and when battle begins, the Changeling is wont to adopt the shape and skill of the most powerful of Tzeentch's soldiers, pounding the enemy to pieces with malicious enthusiasm and borrowed muscle.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Not only can the Changeling mirror the form of another, he can adopt mannerisms and personalities in so flawless a fashion that even the Dark Gods can be deceived.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways cooldown: -1 turns

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
